about_the_game:
KAKURIYO is a online co-op horror game for 1-4 players. You have been brought away by an evil ghost into a haunted space filled with paranormal activity and find that three others had been kidnapped in the same way. You and others have to explore the space and purify cursed objects to escape from the ghost. You will pick up and use survival tools that help investigation and hiding from the ghost.

  • Co-op for 1-4 players: Enjoy the online co-op experience along with your friend in a closed lobby, or with persons all over the world in a public lobby.
  • Beautiful 2D art: Original 2D art brings you unique experience that cannot be provided by 3D art. But, of course, you will be frightened as the same as 3D title.
  • Skill strategy: Skill collection is a strategic side of KAKURIYO. you can choose tens of skills to realize your own escape strategy.
  • Unique Maps: The maps inspired by Japanese horror films are plan to be appeared that provide sense of tradition and terror.

Warning

This game contains an expression that the screen may switch suddenly that may not be suitable for certain people, such as those with heart conditions. Please take care when playing this game.
